body.para: Modified files: share/monetdef af_ZA.ISO_8859-1.src da_DK.ISO_8859-1.src de_DE.ISO_8859-1.src en_AU.ISO_8859-1.src en_CA.ISO_8859-1.src en_GB.ISO_8859-1.src en_NZ.ISO_8859-1.src en_US.ISO_8859-1.src fi_FI.ISO_8859-1.src fr_CA.ISO_8859-1.src fr_FR.ISO_8859-1.src is_IS.ISO_8859-1.src nl_NL.ISO_8859-1.src no_NO.ISO_8859-1.src ru_RU.KOI8-R.src sv_SE.ISO_8859-1.src Log: Change "3;3" in mon_grouping to "3". This is cosmetique, last \0 will cause previous \3 repeat forever, according to SUSv2 Add comment about mon_grouping separator NOTE: mon_grouping localeconv() parsing still broken.

Revision Changes Path 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/af_ZA.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/da_DK.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/de_DE.ISO_8859-1.src 1.3 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/en_AU.ISO_8859-1.src 1.3 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/en_CA.ISO_8859-1.src 1.3 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/en_GB.ISO_8859-1.src 1.3 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/en_NZ.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/en_US.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/fi_FI.ISO_8859-1.src 1.3 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/fr_CA.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/fr_FR.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/is_IS.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/nl_NL.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/no_NO.ISO_8859-1.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/ru_RU.KOI8-R.src 1.4 +3 -3 src/share/monetdef/sv_SE.ISO_8859-1.src
